title: Did the person who died leave any other written wishes?
question: Did {deceasedName} leave any other written wishes?
interestedDetailsHint0: These may also be referred to as a “letter of wishes”.
interestedDetailsHint1: We’re interested in written wishes that include any information on:
interestedDetail1: what to do with the estate
helpText: If there are any such written wishes, you will need to send these to us along with the other documents we need from you.

deceasedWrittenWishes.required: Select ‘yes’ if {deceasedName} left any written wishes
